name: MAWAQIT
0:
”Alexa, open mawaqit”
”Alexa, launch mawaqit”
”Alexa, start mawaqit”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mawaqit
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To make sure the Skill launches correctly, please say Mawakit.

The MAWAQIT skill allows you to get the prayer times for the mosque of your choice!

For example, you can ask when the next prayer is, what time the Friday prayer is, or what time the third prayer ('Asr) is.
The Skill also allows you to get information about your mosque, to play the classic Adhan or the Adhan for the first prayer of the day (Fajr).

To know all available commands, just say "Alexa, what are the available commands?".

PS: Since Alexa struggles with recognizing the names of prayers, we recommend giving the number of the prayer you are interested in instead of the Arabic name.
For example, if you want to know the time of Fajr, say "Alexa, what time is the first prayer?".
The Adhan will play in Arabic.

If you have any feedback to share with us, feel free to contact us, especially on Twitter/X @MAWAQIT.

We hope you enjoy the Skill, assalamu aleykoum!
